website_summaries.verdict: A portable sprayer that gives professional results.
pros: Adjustable pressure gives good control of spray
Cart can hold and transport 5-gallon bucket
cons: Puts out a lot of overspray, making interior painting difficult

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 20 minutes
customer_reviews.text: We have done every troubleshooting routine suggested on the Grayco site. The sprayer will not work. It clogs after ten minutes, and then you have to go through the entire cleaning process, before starting over. We thinned the paint and strained the paint. It is an expensive brand. The 'return window' has closed and now we're stuck with the sprayer. We bought the extended warranty and that doesn't seem to cover anything. We have four hours of trouble shooting time and twenty minutes of total painting time.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Painted a 50 unit building in just a few days.
customer_reviews.text: Bad ass sprayer!! I don't know what these cost right now on Amazon, but the price kept dropping when I was buying it. Went down like $80 total between when I saved it to favorites to when I bought it. Half the price of buying it at HD or Lowes. We had to use a 75' hose on it to reach up to the second story mansard roof on our apartment building and it sprayed full force even at 35' high and 75' of hose. Made our place look sharp!!
customer_reviews.author: Brad A.

customer_reviews.title: single floor historical house in about 4 hours max it's that fast and good. Rolling or brushing would have taken days especially ...
customer_reviews.text: I am an amateur painter. This unit worked really well. Reading directions is key to get it right - don't wing it. You'll regret it. I painted an entire 4 bedroom, single floor historical house in about 4 hours max it's that fast and good. Rolling or brushing would have taken days especially on overhangs and lattice crawlspace coverings. Painters quoted me $4k to paint the house so this saved me a HUGE amount of money. I suggest you buy the longest hose so you can really keep moving without reposition unit. For some reason, I could not get the extension wand to work. Possibly user error but something to consider. Happy buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Pchop

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Graco X7 to replace my Wagner, which I have had for 17 years. It served it's purpose. Now to the Graco. Primes much easier and faster. Sprays evenly. The cleaning process is easy and fast. Cleaning is easier than opening up the old unit to lubricate it, all you do is put suction tube in the Pump Armor and your done. One more item I like is the sprayer hose gets pressurized and pump turns off. As you spray it turns on and off as needed to keep the sprayer pressurized, much quieter.
customer_reviews.author: John Henrich

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for the first gallon of paint
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first gallon of paint. When I started the second gallon I could NOT get it to Prime, no matter what I tried, and I tried a lot. The unit is a bit noisier than my old regular sprayer but is acceptable. I believe I will eventaly get this unit working, at least I hope so. But it is frustrating to be in the start of painting a house and have a sprayer stop working.
customer_reviews.author: morgan hall

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORKING
customer_reviews.text: Very lame machine. Work well for about 2hr then started clogging. Tried to clean it , worked again for a few minutes then stopped. I've repeated the cleaning process a few times , and got the same result. Very frustrating. And I've spent more money on the cleaning solution too which didn't not help. It's going back.
customer_reviews.author: Loredana Stefaniga

customer_reviews.title: Good Mfg but steer clear of this model
customer_reviews.text: This sprayer failed after about 5 hours of use. The fan inside the motor simply blew apart. We called Amazon and they were great about giving us a refund right away and sending out a return label so we can ship the defective unit back. It appears that this particular model, the X7 has now been replaced by the LTS 17. My guess is that Graco was aware of the defect and hopefully has reengineered the motor. For the short time this did work, it did make painting go very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: T. Cardoza

customer_reviews.title: Needs a Better Hose. Soft, flexible and non curling. The hose makes using sprayer a nightmare.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Probably better for outdoor use. Indoor use is fine but the hose is a real pain. I am constantly fighting with it. It is stiff and constantly curls up and gets stuck. It also creates a lot of noise slamming on the floor due to the vibration of the pump. Fighting with the tangling hose is possibly dangerous. I am losing the battle. If anyone can recommend a replacement hose I would appreciate it. Something flexible. This hard plastic hose sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Averagejoe

customer_reviews.title: Damaged!!!
customer_reviews.text: So frustrated. I bought this early so I'd have it for my house remodel. Paying that much for a sprayer I thought it'd at least not be damaged! Now I need to spray and it won't seal and spray properly due to a damaged metal fitting. Needless to say I'm pissed!! I discovered this after thinking it was the hose and spending an additional $50 getting one. Frickin A!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Inexperience with paint sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sprayer to paint the exterior of a 2000sq ft brick rental house. I do very little painting and had never used a sprayer. The end result was a professional looking finish. An essential upgrade to this purchase is a graco 2 finger spray gun. I did the first two coats of primer with the 4 finger that comes with it and it is a major struggle. Painting an exterior is not a simple DIY project but with this equipment it is doable and extremely rewarding. Highly recommend this sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent American made product! Fantastic Results.
customer_reviews.text: Was able to paint an entire house in one day! The results are fantastic. It looks better than the day I bought the house new. The key is prep work, which was made so much easier with a 3M handi masker, which applied tape and plastic sheeting to trim and around doors and other areas you don’t want paint on. I wasn’t sure of keeping this, and seriously considered rolling the paint on. After paining the garage in only minutes, I realized this was the way to go. As others have said this model is made for DIYers and probably not suitable for painting every day. That being said, it’s an incredible sprayer and I couldn’t be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: csaggie

customer_reviews.title: Great product-Excellent Support
customer_reviews.text: If it's so great why only 4 stars? It's only because the tip that came with the unit was defective. 20 minutes online with tech support and I decided to swap out the tip with another one (which I, thankfully, had purchased beforehand). If I hadn't had the extra tip all the prep work would have been for naught.
customer_reviews.author: S. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Sprayer has worked well. Purchased to paint a large barn on my farm. Very easy to use. I recommend you add an extension and swivel to the gun and you will probably need a longer hose for exterior work. A bit tedious to clean up, but that is the nature of paint equipment. Graco has done about all they can to make it easier. I have a lot of experience with compressed air sprayers, but this is my first airless outfit. The transition was easy. Follow the instructions and you should get good results.
customer_reviews.author: Ibuy2muchonline

customer_reviews.title: Works really well but be sure to clean it thoroughly after you use it.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well BUT you have to clean it thoroughly and on time or you will have trouble. This may well be true of all paint sprayers, but since this is my first, I had to learn the hard way - a lot longer to clean and had to replace the filter (which was easy to do).
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dresher

customer_reviews.title: No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: I’m remodeling floor to ceiling and doing primer on ceiling, walls, trim, etc. I didn’t want to roll primer for days so I ordered it to shoot the whole room, room by room. It works great! I look forward to trying it with paint. Cleanup is kinda a pain but 100% necessary at the end of every use. I’ve used it three times and have been getting quicker with priming, spraying, and cleaning. I haven’t tried the hose method, just a bucket of water, but cleaning works with a garden hose as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Does a nice job
customer_reviews.text: Added a 3 car tandem garage, a studio, and shop to our home. Quotes to prime and paint the new drywall were $2500 and up in the Chicago area. Bought the X7, and watched a bunch of videos on line. A few days of masking, 12 gallons of paint, and about $1000 out of pocket later the task was complete. 2500 sq ft of walls and ceilings took about 5-6 hours. I purchased some latex gloves, tyvek suits, and a good respirator too. In my opinion these are mandatory when working with ceilings. Well worth the investement.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Bee

customer_reviews.title: Pumped water fine but not paint
customer_reviews.text: Followed initial setup instructions for the sprayer and had it pumping water through the bypass. Switched it over to my 5 gallon can of latex (Sherwin Williams Loxon) and no go. I could suck paint up the tube my self but the sprayer couldn't draw anything up the tube. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Moosejaw

customer_reviews.title: or that heavy of materials but it handled the work like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box I put up 40 gallons of prep right block filler, 50 gallons of a100 exterior and some multisurface primer. My complaint list is its slow, and the bucket hook should be 2" higher on the rig. Past that, I put it through the paces and it survived. It's not made for that kind of volume, or that heavy of materials but it handled the work like a champ. Great for weekend projects or real small jobs.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Great paint sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Great sprayer. It helped me to paint my 2 cars garage in 1 day. Easy to use and good quality components
customer_reviews.author: BLUEKNIFE

customer_reviews.title: This is not a toy!
customer_reviews.text: I always do my research to find the best product to fit my needs, then I come to Amazon for the best price. The perfect tool for the handyman who hates painting. A word of caution...this is not a toy. Please follow the safety guidelines. There are plenty of how to videos on youtube.
customer_reviews.author: Wyndell Francis

customer_reviews.title: One of retirement's greatest pleasures...
customer_reviews.text: ... is finally getting the chance to go out and get every single power tool, hand tool, convenience, etc. known to man ....and to have the right and perfect tool for every single task you decide to take on. If you are ever going to think about painting... ...anything... This... .......IS THE RIGHT TOOL..
customer_reviews.author: K. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Paint away
customer_reviews.text: Works right out of the box. This is my second Graco paint sprayer. The first one I bought in 2004 was the next size down and it worked great until I forgot to use the pump armor after I was finished using it the last time. These paint sprayers take about 15 minutes to properly clean when you are finished but just like with any piece of equipment if you take care of it, they will last you for many years. It is important to use the pump armor after you are finished cleaning it.
customer_reviews.author: h2oman

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine. I use it whenever I can on ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine. I use it whenever I can on decks, painting interior, and spraying whatever. I'm still getting used to the pressure setting for the tips. Still tends to leave fingers well spraying. I also bought it the roller attachment. That works great. Clean up isn't so bad once you get used to it and how to do it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: bjabts

customer_reviews.title: Better than comparable products
customer_reviews.text: Glad we went with this model. We checked home depot before ordering and found it on Amazon much cheaper. My husband owns a painting business and this gets the job done. Works as well, if not better, than some of the higher end models.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: While I don't like cleaning up and this requires a bit of time to clean, it was great to use for the whole house. It went fast and worked great. I, however, am not a fan of pictures of people using this without masks, eye protection, and full tyvek suits. The paint goes everywhere so it's a joke to see someone in the ads painting with no PPE or covering :)
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: My first sprayer. Paid 330 for it. I suggest buying the extra 50 foot of hose and the sprayer extentsion. This sprayer works well, painted a house by myself in a few days. Speeds things up considerable. I recommend this for the homeowner who has a do it yourself project.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect. Painted my house and garage in 2 days including trim. Works flawlessly if you dont slack on the cleaning process after the days work is done. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good sprayer but....
customer_reviews.text: I love this sprayer but it has some issues. Like if you don't prime it properly it won't spray and I stored this after a couple of months and wanted to do some painting on the fence and now for some reason, the dang thing won't prime the paint and spray all it does was let out the liquid that protects the internal parts.
customer_reviews.author: bear

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best! I repainted my whole fence in about 1 1/2 hours! I have also used it to paint some cabinets and a work shop. It’s worth the money as you finish a project in half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: The best paint system for latex I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: A bit of work to keep clean, but nothing worthwhile is easy. This lays down an uber-smooth coat of paint and made the crown molding in my home look like they came from the factory in their current color. I'm looking forward to using this in the rest of our home.
customer_reviews.author: CyberGolem

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and isn’t back breaking to do paint jobs!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Perfect for the regular painter. I always ensure to screen all paint even new paint to ensure there is no clogs. Works good, Graco sprayers are great units and the tips can be changed. A few things to keep in mind - you may want a longer hose and an extension so you can breeze through paint jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent work, not easy to learn and use at first but you get used to it. The bucket holder is WAY TOO LOW. 5 gallons bucket was dragging on the floor, had I not checked as Io was pulling the bucket would have fallen and emptied on the floor. Great paint sprayer, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine H

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is a quality machine for a homeowner. It makes the project go very fast and does a fine job. The clean up is time consuming but not discouraging. We like it very much and the more we use it and get familiar with it, we feel it was a very good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Paul of Jurupa Valley

customer_reviews.title: The machine was easy to use and to clean
customer_reviews.text: I have used it to paint several buildings around my farm. The machine was easy to use and to clean. The buildings look new again after only a few hours work. Not bad for a 73 year old guy.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence

customer_reviews.title: Used to paint fence
customer_reviews.text: Used to paint 1 acre fence. Worked like a champ on acrylic latex. No issues. I did buy a 317 nozzle. After ~20g it wore out from 6" spray to 10" After 30g it was more than 12". Important to have extra nozzles if you need accurate spray pattern.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't recommend highly enough
customer_reviews.text: Painted a ranch house in record time and saved a bunch of money. Some hiccups for the DIY guy, but I have no real complaints, this was an excellent purchase, and I am happy with my DIY project. And I still have several interior projects that I am confident that this will help me with.
customer_reviews.author: Pair A Normal

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable!
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this for paining houses and cabins and it works great! As long as you clean it out and take care of it we have had great luck with it!! We bought the extension tip and he got some additional tips for different applications but we are very happy. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: River's Edge Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Reliable quality unit.
customer_reviews.text: Used it to paint my daughters house inside and out. Worked very well. The hose that comes with it is pretty stiff and hard to work with. Recommend purchasing the swivel for the spray gun, which helps some. But still a pain to deal with the hose. The results were very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great sprayer for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first paint sprayer, and with no prior experience operating a paint sprayer, i can lay down a near professional finish on furniture/cabinets. Pretty straight forward operation after you use it a couple times. Would deferentially recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: when you use it on high mode it socks a lot of paint but still efficient, before and after pictures
customer_reviews.text: make sure you watch the online video for use, very helpful to explain operating sprayer
customer_reviews.author: stephon d puryear

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a beast. I've used it now several times. It is very easy to operate and easy to clean up and store. I could not ask for a better sprayer. It was also a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan S.

customer_reviews.title: Works as good as a professional model, great value!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great instructions and being able to hook up a water hose to flush it out is amazingly easy! Comes with an attachment to hook up to your hose for cleaning! Quite! Doesn’t blow overspray either! Only wish that it came with a 50 foot hose instead of 25, that’s an extra expense. It’s not too much tho... 😁
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, Awesome for Exterior Staining!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to stain my house with a Home Depot Behr solid stain. It works awesome and helped me save a significant amount of time. It burns through material but does an awesome job. Get an extension and longer hose, totally worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Roepke

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer works great. To optimize results clean thoroughly
customer_reviews.text: Sprayer works great. To optimize results clean thoroughly, you must also take apart and remove and clean the long filter within the sprayer gun itself. Very happy with the results. Also take your time and spray evenly. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It works great and made the task of painting the houses so ...
customer_reviews.text: We painted both my mom's and my in-laws homes in one month and we used this sprayer for both homes. It works great and made the task of painting the houses so much easier. It only took us two days to spray two coats on both homes- one day for my in-laws house and one day for my mom's house. It sprays evenly and is easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: dldesch

customer_reviews.title: Handles oil based primers like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth and powerful enough for residential painting even with heavy latex paints. Handles oil based primers like a dream. I love the hose connection for cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Olds

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, fast work, minimal overspray
customer_reviews.text: Amazing difference. I weigh my large DIY project costs against what it would cost for someone to do it for me. To have someone paint my house would cost about $2k. I started off using a paint brush, and completed a small section in about 2 hours. Purchased and received this (added the extension and another 50' hose, which connected for a total of 75'), and I did the remainder of my 2800, 2 story home in 2 more hours. Cost of this plus 15 gallons of (uncut, thick) paint ~ $700. Plan to spend about 1 hour after cleaning the machine out.
customer_reviews.author: sjk

customer_reviews.title: A must get
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sprayer to stain my new Western Red Cedar fence. It gave me no problems. I really like the air pressure regulator knob where you can adjust the air pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Flores007

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome paint sprayer, actually the second one we bought (first one was stolen). Will buy again if we ever need one. Very durable, has wheels, so it rolls smooth, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jena Robinson

customer_reviews.title: saved me tons right away
customer_reviews.text: This more than paid for itself on the first house I had painted I think I have had my team paint 4 more houses since... saves so much time
customer_reviews.author: I can see you

customer_reviews.title: Huge time saver
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Saved a ton of time painting my house. Takes a little getting used to (it’s my first sprayer), but so worth it. Will be spraying all my interior doors next...just be sure to get the right tip for the job and an extension if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: JG37

customer_reviews.title: Good airless sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this with water soluble paint, works great, clean up is easy so long as you don't let the paint dry in the machine, gun or hose.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Closest thing to pro without the extreme cost
customer_reviews.text: We had our last one for 18 years until it got stolen. Researched for hours looking for my replacement because I paint so regularly compared to the average DIYer, and read many pro's claim it to be a great starter for start-ups and amazing for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy!!
customer_reviews.text: Simple set up and easy to use. Didn't take long to spray the ceiling in my entire house!! Looks like a professional did it. Also easy clean up. Just hook up a garden hose and turn it on!!
customer_reviews.author: eric0000

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality paint sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I recommended this to my buddy who is a painter for the last 28 years... he loves it.. he says it’s a great item really well-built and as far as I know he uses it all the time
customer_reviews.author: William Koczocik

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy USA 🇺🇸 product if in Australia
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this product from amazon if you live in Australia 🇦🇺. The problem is the USA 🇺🇸 electricity does not match in any way. I just wish I did more research or Amazon realised it was a US product and not compatible. I didn’t use the product but threw the boxes 📦 and Amazon return date passed before I went to use it. Stars ⭐️ given only because I did all the research except the one important thing. Electricity!!
customer_reviews.author: Ian King

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Spray pump
customer_reviews.text: This pump is really awesome for under $400 the 1st. time I used it I painted the outside of a 3500 square Ft. house without 1 single problem & cant wait to use it again...the YouTube videos are very helpful..it was everything they said it was & more.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Eugene Meer

customer_reviews.title: A new must have.
customer_reviews.text: I hate painting!!! That being said, when I do it,it has to meet a specific standard that even the people hired to do it for me have a difficult time achieving. I’m building kitchen cabinets for my sons house. I’m now in the painting process. Bought the Greco magnum x7 and as far as meeting my standard.... mission accomplished!!! FFLP tips are amazing. Check them out also.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bob

customer_reviews.title: primed and painted the the whole interior of my 1200sf house easily, including the ceilings
customer_reviews.text: Never used one before, primed and painted the the whole interior of my 1200sf house easily, including the ceilings. It looks great! Like a pro did it
customer_reviews.author: BigDave

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: First time user/owner of a paint sprayer, and with a slight learning curve finished my new 8'x12' shed in 4 hrs. Will need some practice (and lots of tape and plastic!) to feel comfortable indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Millikan

customer_reviews.title: Great sprayer for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is my second sprayer, the first one sprayed over 5000 gallons before it finally died. can’t beat the quality for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Randal

customer_reviews.title: Bad hose
customer_reviews.text: Sprayer worked well....eventually..... got it all set up to paint, pulled the trigger and realized there was a small slice in the hose that caused a big mess everywhere. Had to run out and purchase new hose from Home Depot. Finally got it working and it made a big project seem small.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Roehling

customer_reviews.title: Great product and worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great sprayer for any job. Easy to use and easy to clean. Also customer service was great when I called to ask a simple question.
customer_reviews.author: Medin K

customer_reviews.title: First time user
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money I never used a paint sprayer before, I bought the 30 inch extension and painted the entire outside my house. Easy to clean the sprayer with the garden hose attachment I gave it a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Will send junk back

customer_reviews.title: Worked great but You have to clean it VERY well After ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great but You have to clean it VERY well After each use or it cloggs up. Found out the hard way. The sprayer had to soak for a whole day to get it unclogged. And that was after I cleaned it after that use- must not have been good enough.
customer_reviews.author: karen Italiano

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great system, Great price! I spray latex, lacquer you name it it can spray it.
customer_reviews.author: ADAM

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Stopped spraying after 2 yrs. Expensive to fix. I don't recommend this for a paint contractor.
customer_reviews.author: Boyd Painting

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all.. used on two progects after completing cleaning per instructions it now won't prime, so it's now useless and I'm out $350
customer_reviews.author: Burto75

customer_reviews.title: A really good tool
customer_reviews.text: This Graco X7 is an improved version of my previous Graco which was a 3 or 5. I really don't remember but I bought the first one in '98 or '99. Had it not been stolen I would still be using it. I really like the improved power. I used to have to dilute some thicker paints. With this new one there is no problem shooting really thick stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Reuben R Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this item for our business -  General Contractors.
customer_reviews.text: Husband and his workers used this machine to spray ceilings in an 2000 sq. ft. house recently damaged by hurricane Florence in NC. Worked great , easy to clean up and easier to use. Did a fantastic job in a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sprayer!
customer_reviews.text: This sprayer definitely a good asset for a DIY homeowner. Couldn’t imagine painting my home without it. The only complaint would be the 25’ hose is too short but it is a situationally issue for me...not functionality. I’ll eventually step up to the 50’ airless hose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First time to use airless sprayer. So easy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use easy to clean up. We have a large ranch style home. Went to see if my husband had got it set up, he had already sprayed the whole front of wood siding house. Took about 1 1/2 hrs with the eaves!!! Was worth every penny spent. Looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Great product but watch out.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, BUT watch out for heavy overspray. They should sell it with their new look tips but then again they would avoid having you buy one!
customer_reviews.author: Stuartk

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine! WOW! What a time saver!
customer_reviews.text: Painted all three of my buildings, worked great and quick.
customer_reviews.author: msta999

customer_reviews.title: Worked great! Save some cash!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Painted my 2 story house this summer and saved a ton of cash! I'm going to paint my cabinet doors and drawer fronts next. There are plenty of YouTube videos explaining how to work and clean this sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Don’t spray in the wind and clean it when you’re done
customer_reviews.text: I like it better than the small one. Wish I could of got the next size up. It would of been over kill but that’s just me.
customer_reviews.author: Rex

customer_reviews.title: Pump is easy but time consuming to clean.  Spray pattern good at first but quality rapidly degraded
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great initially but the spray gun began to leak out of the tip and when you start the next spray, you have an abundance of paint and requires touch up. No clear solution on how to fix or eliminate problem.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Terbovich

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: My only issue was that it requires a lot to use this thing, a lot of trouble shooting, a lot of steps in set up and break down. It did perform great once you get through all the initial work.
customer_reviews.author: Delvis

customer_reviews.title: It works great but it is a task to clean
customer_reviews.text: It works great but it is a task to clean. The work is all in the set up and the cleaning. It takes some practice to get a good technique but painting is a breeze. It was well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth its weight in gold!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a champ!!!! No issues after months of use.
customer_reviews.author: charles king

customer_reviews.title: WE LOVE THIS.
customer_reviews.text: MAINT TEAM LOVES THIS - ARE COMMUNITY IS FENCED IN AND WE WATERPROOF/STAIN OUR FENCES AND POSTS. SAVES SO MUCH TYPE AND MONEY. WE LOVE THIS.
customer_reviews.author: CARM

customer_reviews.title: Saves time while spraying perfectly, saves tons of paint as well!
customer_reviews.text: My brother is using this machine for his job and he says it saves so much paint and time. Plus the finishing of the paint is flawless. This product is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sambatuca

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome I have two shed 16x20 and 12x12 did both ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome I have two shed 16x20 and 12x12 did both in 30 minutes awesome I'm moving on two laundry room then kitchen, living room bathroom and bedrooms. But for them going to buy 211 tip it's 4" tip I think will be better for cabinets and inside house The tip that comes with it 10" But they swap out so fast you can go back and forth in seconds So better for outdoors and big walk areas inside. Easy to clean...i just love it Only wish it had a area where I could keep my wrenches and toothbrush so when I clean it it's all right there I'm a HAPPY CAMPER!!!!!! OH YEAH
customer_reviews.author: vic

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 days of spraying house
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer broke 2 days after use. Not happy now I have to go thru the hassle of contacting Manufacturer an take it in....
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great Sprayer !
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Highly recommend. Easy to clean using a Water Hose attachment to the Input line.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: has a nice "guide" to help set up
customer_reviews.text: did exactly what is was intended to do.. has a nice "guide" to help set up, clean up, etc... Would buy again..
customer_reviews.author: Runnin4me

customer_reviews.title: Good machine.
customer_reviews.text: Good machine, no issues. Read the instructions and follow them to the letter and you will be happy with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sprayer, More than I could ask for
customer_reviews.text: Great Sprayer, More than I could ask for. Set Up and Clean takes time but Quick Card for Instructions are Good
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T. Micucci

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sprayer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine! The best one I've ever owned! Practical and efficient! I just wish the handle would be a little shorter.
customer_reviews.author: FSCF

customer_reviews.title: Make it easy
customer_reviews.text: This sprayer makes painting or staining a breeze. Glad I made the decision to purchase one.
customer_reviews.author: Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Makes painting economic and timely
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased to paint my home. awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Harvey

customer_reviews.title: leaks
customer_reviews.text: Leaks where hose and machine connects. It made a huge mess in my driverway. Lucky I wasn't spraying indoors. Even tho this machine has wheels it doesn't move when it's in use because it doesnt carry the paint with it. Very dissappointed
customer_reviews.author: Hdpham85

customer_reviews.title: Good overall for painting
customer_reviews.text: Worked nice aside from the sprayer itself didn’t hold up very well. Not a bad unit after you separately purchase a higher quality sprayer for the set up.
customer_reviews.author: Steven K

customer_reviews.title: great paint sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Works great, sprays evenly, very easy to clean up. worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra over the less expensive options.
customer_reviews.text: Best paint sprayer I’ve used. Painted an entire interior of a home in no time at all. I’ve used other sprayers and they constantly have issues.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Easy instructions
customer_reviews.text: Machine is easy and effective. Got the job done in half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore

customer_reviews.title: Refund was short changed by $103.69 DONT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY THIS SPRAYER!!!!!! I returned this sprayer with box not opened and in original packaging and they short changed my refund by $103.69. If you’re not certain about this item, don’t waste your time. Unbelievable!!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great airless for good price
customer_reviews.text: The machine arrived on time and in super condition. It took very little to set up and worked perfectly the whole time it was used. Very impressed with the product. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fry

customer_reviews.title: Very good sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Great machine for around the home. It's not professional grade but very very well made and works great.....
customer_reviews.author: LeoJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is like the Lord himself kissed it right on the tip.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

product_meta.title: Graco Magnum 262805 X7 Cart Airless Paint Sprayer
product_meta.description:
Style:Magnum X7 Airless Paint SprayerThe Graco Project Series sprayers make it easy for avid DIY homeowners and handymen to power through small to midsize jobs with speed and finesse. DIY homeowners and handymen are equipped to save time and money with the Magnum X7. Tackle any indoor project, exterior homes, fences or decks. Includes SG2 Metal Spray Gun, RAC IV 515 Switch Tip, 25 ft. Durable paint hose, Pump Armor storage fluid, Power Flush adapter, Quick Start-Up Guide and Operation Manual. Inlet Paint Strainer- 35 Mesh Stainless Steel Screen.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Graco - The Brand Preferred by Pros. Whether you’re a weekend warrior, a serious DIY enthusiast, a handyman or remodeling contractor, or a painting professional, Graco makes the ideal airless spraying equipment to meet your needs. Whether you are just starting out or moving up, choose the Magnum or Graco model to help you handle your job with ease. No matter what you're painting—entire homes, rooms, decks or fences—Graco has you covered!
feature_bullets: CONTROL PAINT FLOW: Fully adjustable pressure to give you ultimate control of paint flow for any project size; RAC IV SwitchTip allows you to reverse the tip when clogged to keep you spraying
SPRAY PAINT UNTHINNED: Stainless Steel Piston Pump allows you to spray paint unthinned at high pressure
SPRAY DIRECTLY FROM PAINT BUCKET: Flexible suction tube allows you to spray directly from a 1 or 5 gallon paint bucket
FAST AND EASY CLEAN-UP: PowerFlush Adapter connects to a garden hose for fast and easy cleaning
IDEAL FOR MULTI STORY HOMES: Can support up to 100 ft of paint hose allowing you to spray second and third story homes
CONTINUOUS SPRAYING: RAC IV SwitchTip allows you to reverse the tip when clogged to keep you spraying
Convenient Cart - Easily move sprayer around on the job
TrueAirless Spray Tip with SoftSpray Technology - greater control and less overspray with a wide range of coatings
SPRAY MORE PROJECTS EACH YEAR: Annual use recommendation is up to 125 gallons per year

specifications.Included Components: SG2 Metal Spray Gun, RAC IV 515 SwitchTip, 25 ft. Duraflex paint hose, Pump Armor storage fluid, PowerFlush adapter, Quick Start-Up Guide and Operation Manual
specifications.Warranty Description: One year warranty against manufacturer defect
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars615 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
